Header: New Constructions at 121 Brigade Vested in Soldiers
Content: Own soldiers-constructed Corporals’ Club, Privates’ Mess and the accommodation building for Other Ranks serving the 121 Brigade Headquarters at Kumbukkana, Moneragala were vested in the soldiers on Thursday (12). General Officer Commanding, 12 Division, Major General Nishantha Wanniarachchi as the Chief Guest for the event at the invitation of the Commander, 121 Brigade, Brigadier Nalin Koswatte opened those facilities. Built at a cost of about Rs 6.2 million, they were completed by soldiers serving the 121 Brigade.
